game.name: Everbrew
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Farm, cook, and design your very own woodland café in Everbrew, a cozy pixel-art management game. Harvest ingredients, craft delicious meals, and welcome woodland creatures as they gather to relax, eat, and feel at home.
